features: Small Broom and Dustpan Set: Lumkew hand dustpan and brush set helps clean up small areas that need to be swept quickly, such as scattered food scraps, crumbs, spills, loose cat litter and plants soil

Quick Capture: Four layers of high-density bristles are neatly aligned to quickly capture everything from mini dusting particles to large debris. The multi-layer design can also adapt well to different surface textures

No Debris Left Behind: The dustpan have wide, thin edge, and non-slip grooved bottom. Which allows the front lip to fit snugly to the floor, effectively preventing crumbs from spilling out and avoiding additional multiple cleanups

Compact & Convenient: 2-in-1 design holds the dustpan and brush tightly together to save storage space. Compact size (13.78 X 3.54 inches), can be hung behind the door or placed in the sink‘s corner, also can be carried around for camping or cars

Multiple Uses: Mini broom and dustpan set also can brush all kinds of kichen countertop, table, fireplaces, breadboards, cabinets inside, floor corner, furniture, camping, trucks, office desk. From home indoor to the outdoor, cleaning any small messes spaces

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Hand Small Broom and Dustpan Set sweeping the small messes, debris, crumbs, spills, and other tiny dity
4 Layers of Dense Bristle provide a large area of coverage, quickly capture even the little dusting particles

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Multi-functional small broom and dustpan set captures all kinds of dirt and debris
reviews.reviewText: Our kitchen floor stays a lot neater now that we’re keeping this small broom and dustpan set under the counter for quick cleanups. It's compact and convenient, with a high-density broom that captures all kinds of dirt, and a dustpan that fits snugly against the floor to prevent spills. We use it for all sorts of small messes because it’s lightweight and a lot easier than dealing with a full broom and larger dustpan. It’s quickly becoming our go-to cleaning tool for small messes on our kitchen floor.
